name: WebUI
description: Class for spawning a dynamic Web Browser.

constructor.name: is_visible
constructor.description: if WebUI is visible on screen

constructor.name: auto_resize
constructor.description: if should auto resize when screen changes it's size (useful OFF when you are painting meshes with WebUI)

constructor.name: width
constructor.description: size of the WebUI width when you are not using auto_resize

constructor.name: height
constructor.description: size of the WebUI height when you are not using auto_resize

functions.name: BringToFront
functions.description: Puts this WebUI in the front of all WebUIs

functions.name: CallEvent
functions.description: Calls an Event on the Browser's JavaScript

parameters.name: event_name
parameters.description: The Event Name to trigger the event

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Arguments to pass to the event

functions.name: Destroy
functions.description: Destroys this Browser

functions.name: LoadURL
functions.description: Loads a new File/URL in this Browser

functions.name: LoadHTML
functions.description: Loads a pure HTML in this Browser

functions.name: SetFocus
functions.description: Enables the focus on this browser (i.e. can receive Keyboard input and will trigger input events)
functions.description_long:
Enables the focus on this browser (i.e. can receive Keyboard input and will trigger input events
Note: Only one browser can have focus per time.

functions.name: RemoveFocus
functions.description: Removes the focus from this WebUI (and sets it back to game viewport)
functions.description_long:
Removes the focus from this WebUI (and sets it back to game viewport)
You MUST call this after you don't need keyboard input anymore

functions.name: SetLayout
functions.description: Sets the Canvas Layout on Screen

functions.name: SetFreeze
functions.description: Freezes the WebUI Rendering to the surface (it will still execute the JS under the hood)

functions.name: SetVisibility
functions.description: Toggles the visibility

functions.name: SpawnSound
functions.description: Spawns a Sound entity to plays this WebUI sound

functions.name: SendMouseWheelEvent
functions.description: Sends a Mouse Event into the WebUI programatically

functions.name: SendKeyEvent
functions.description: Sends a Key Event into the WebUI programatically

functions.name: SendMouseMoveEvent
functions.description: Sends a Mouse Move Event into the WebUI programatically

functions.name: SendMouseClickEvent
functions.description: Sends a Mouse Click into the WebUI programatically
functions.description_long: You must send both Down and Up to make it work properly

parameters.name: is_mouse_up
parameters.description: Whether the event was up or down

functions.name: IsValid
functions.description: Gets if this entity is Valid

functions.name: GetID
functions.description: Gets the network ID of this entity

functions.name: GetSize
functions.description: Gets the current size of this WebUI

functions.name: GetClass
functions.description: Gets the class of this entity

functions.name: IsVisible
functions.description: Returns if this WebUI is currently visible

functions.name: Subscribe
functions.description: Subscribes for an Event

functions.name: Unsubscribe
functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed Events in this Entity and in this Package, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

events.name: Fail
events.description: Triggered when this page fails to load

events.name: Ready
events.description: Triggered when this page is fully loaded
